name: Techs4Biz
overview:
Pervidi is a field force automation suite of products combining handheld devices (PDAs), wireless connectivity, software, and web portals. By utilising dynamic user-definable checklists Pervidi can automate ANY field activity including health & safety inspections, work orders, asset management, service activities, preventative maintenance activities, and custom data collection tasks.

Pervidi W3 - Hosted Inspection Management (Software as a Service)

  • Inspection Management
  • Asset Management
  • Biomedical and other Healthcare Service Providers
  • Field Service / Field Force Automation
  • Maintenance Management (CMMS)
  • Facilities Management

Pervidi was designed with maximum flexibility and ease of use, focusing on their customers’ diversity. Their PDA applications are specifically designed for effective execution of inspections and work orders; their web portals are designed for end users and remote access; and their software products are designed for power users, operations staff, and management.
